docs.snippet: A new generation has learned how to use the tools of democracy that were largely denied them by passive educators.
Allies of Jared Kushner and Mexican officials say he has worked, with some success, to preserve a relationship that has been corroded by President Trump’s clashes with his Mexican counterpart.

headline.print_headline: President’s Son-in-Law Works Quietly To Mend Frayed Relations With Mexico
headline.main: As Ties With Mexico Fray, Kushner Works Quietly to Mend Them

docs.snippet: Hundreds of pages of correspondence between two intermediaries reveal an active effort to win over President Trump on behalf of Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.

headline.print_headline: Paid by Gulf Monarchs to Bend President’s Ear
headline.main: How 2 Gulf Monarchies Sought to Influence the White House

docs.snippet: The chief American envoy to the Iran nuclear talks is banking on political savvy and Midwestern earnestness to salvage the deal that President Trump wants to scrap.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Taking Talks ‘One Week at a Time’ on the Iran Nuclear Deal
headline.main: U.S. Taking Negotiations ‘One Week at a Time’ on Expiring Iran Deal

docs.snippet: The funeral for Mr. Graham, who died last week at 99, drew leaders from across the Christian world, as well as President Trump and other dignitaries.

headline.print_headline: At Graham’s Funeral, Warm Memories and a Little Evangelism
headline.main: As in Life, Billy Graham Draws a Huge Crowd as Thousands Pay Their Final Respects

docs.snippet: Mr. Kudlow, a CNBC commentator, is the leading candidate to head the National Economic Council.

headline.print_headline: Pundit Is Trump’s Pick  To Take Over Cohn’s Role As Top Economic Adviser
headline.main: Larry Kudlow Is the New Favorite to Replace Gary Cohn

docs.snippet: President Trump’s latest restrictions on Chinese goods and investments could shake China’s economy and strain the power structure Xi Jinping has created for himself.

headline.print_headline: Reply From Beijing Could Rattle Global Economy
headline.main: Trump’s Trade Threats Put China’s Leader on the Spot

docs.snippet: President Trump unleashes his charms on Kim Jong-un and the voters of the 18th Congressional District.
News that Mr. Bolton will become President Trump’s third national security adviser was met with immediate acclaim and criticism. We rounded some of it up for you.

headline.print_headline: How the Left and the Right Reacted to John Bolton as National Security Adviser
headline.main: How the Left and the Right Reacted to John Bolton as National Security Adviser

docs.snippet: A pornographic film star who says she had an affair with President Trump will return $130,000 she got from Mr. Trump’s personal lawyer if doing so means she can speak freely, her lawyer said in a letter.

headline.print_headline: Stormy Daniels Offers to Return Payment to End Deal for Her Silence
headline.main: Stormy Daniels Offers to Return Payment to End Deal for Her Silence
